mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), leaderId = #{loginedMemberId}, `name`= #{name}, region = #{region}, category = #{category};
mapper.select:
SELECT c.*, m.nickname AS 'extra__writer', b.name AS board_name FROM club c INNER JOIN `member` m ON a.memberId = m.id WHERE 1
AND c.category = #{category};
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR a.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
ORDER BY a.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitFrom}, #{limitTake}
